研究：英国有130万残疾工人陷入严重不安全的工作兰卡斯特大学工作基金会的最新研究显示，英国有 130 万残疾工人陷入严重不稳定的工作状态，其中 43 万人表示他们希望延长工作时间。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Study-13-million-disabled-workers-are-trapped-in-severely-insecure-work-in-the-UK.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Study-13-million-disabled-workers-are-trapped-in-severely-insecure-work-in-the-UK.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=fc260a4e-7f89-4eeb-aad0-1a70e496f896 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 00:55:52 -0400 Study: 1.3 million disabled workers are trapped in severely insecure work in the UK

分期腹腔镜检查可以早期发现胰腺癌：研究发表在《美国外科医生学会杂志》上的一项研究表明，对新诊断出的胰腺癌患者进行小型外科手术有助于早期发现癌症扩散并确定癌症阶段https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Staging-laparoscopy-enables-early-detection-of-pancreatic-cancer-Study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Staging-laparoscopy-enables-early-detection-of-pancreatic-cancer-Study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=b5aaedfb-d4f9-462c-82d7-3c57443236ff Fri, 30 Jun 2023 00:32:27 -0400 Staging laparoscopy enables early detection of pancreatic cancer: Study
研究综述微生物琥珀酸生产现状同行评审期刊《工业生物技术》上的一篇综合评论文章讨论了生物基琥珀酸成功工业化的现状和未来前景。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Study-reviews-the-status-of-microbial-succinic-acid-production.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/Study-reviews-the-status-of-microbial-succinic-acid-production.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=bdc31746-779c-44ba-a237-7b30a7d96bd4 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 00:12:20 -0400 Study reviews the status of microbial succinic acid production
新型光子雷达系统可实现高精度和非侵入性监控在各种临床环境中，例如重症监护病房、健康状况危急的患者、老年护理机构和监狱的健康监测，或在困倦可能导致事故的安全监测情况下，都需要对生命体征进行持续监测。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/New-photonic-radar-system-allows-highly-precise-and-non-pressive-monitoring.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/New-photonic-radar-system-allows-highly-precise-and-non-pressive-monitoring.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=faf912aa-1d96-4ac2-b374-ffb719c97b87 Fri, 30 Jun 2023 00:09:13 -0400 New photonic radar system allows highly precise and non-invasive monitoring
研究发现，艾滋病毒患者容易受到抑郁和焦虑等社会心理挑战COVID-19 大流行对全国和世界各地产生了重大的心理影响。新的研究表明，艾滋病毒感染者特别容易受到抑郁、焦虑、药物滥用、孤独等心理社会挑战的影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/HIV-患者-susceptible-to-psychosocial-challenges-like-depression-and-anxiety-finds-study.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230630/HIV-患者-susceptible-to-psychosocial-challenges-like-depression-and-anxiety-finds-study.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=255b920c-d766-4bd6-a75a-af1c957549ac Fri, 30 Jun 2023 00:06:01 -0400 HIV patients susceptible to psychosocial challenges like depression and anxiety, finds study
童年时期的挑食习惯一直持续到成年，影响饮食选择研究探讨了幼儿时期的挑食与其对成年早期食物消费模式和体重状况的长期影响之间的关联。该研究旨在深入了解挑食和饮食习惯之间的关系，以及对体重管理的潜在影响。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Childhood-picky-eating-habits-persist-into-adulthood-impacting-dietary-choices.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20230629/Childhood-picky-eating-habits-persist-into-adulthood-impacting-dietary-choices.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=cef373a7-44fd-4cb0-a258-3b22b31058a8 Thu, 29 Jun 2023 23:21:00 -0400 Childhood picky eating habits persist into adulthood, impacting dietary choices
